thread.title: Gallery: Hastings in state of emergency as large fires burn
thread.title_full: Gallery: Hastings in state of emergency as large fires burn

title: Gallery: Hastings in state of emergency as large fires burn
text:
Gallery: Hastings in state of emergency as large fires burn Last updated 15:39, February 13 2017 FRANCIS DE JAGER 
The fire in the Tuki Tki Valley, Hawke's Bay. 
Members of the public are being asked to stay away from several blazes ripping through the Hastings district. 
Properties were being evacuated along Waimarama Rd, near Havelock North, where one house had been destroyed and a second was under threat by a large grass fire. Wildfires were also burning on Colin White Rd in Poukawa, Endersly Rd in Havelock North and Puketitiri. 
Here are some images of the fires fuelling the state of emergency. VANESSA CROWLEY 
Helicopters with monsoon buckets were called to the blaze on Waimarama Rd on Monday afternoon.
